title: Vidala Pulla Nesathukku Lyrics Periya Marudhu
stanzas:
Vedala pulla nesathukku
sevatha pulla paasathukku
azhagar mala kaaththu
vandhu thoodhu sollaadho.(2)

vaasamalli poothirukku
vaakkapada kaathirukku
saangumani poongazhuthil
thaali katta venumaiyaa
saangumani poongazhuthil
thaali katta venumaiyaa

Vedala pulla nesathukku
sevatha pulla paasathukku
azhagar mala kaaththu
vandhu thoodhu sollaadho

yegapatta aasa vandhu
ila manasa thaakkuthaiyaa
unna nenachu manasula
edhukku yaekkam
vandhathaiyaa..(2)

thoappukulla kuruvi ellam
sondham kondu pesudhu
sondhamulla naamum ingae
jodi eppo aavadhu.

oorukkulla paakku vaikka
thaedhi onnu paakkanum.
ooradangi pona pinne
naama mattum pesanum.

sandhanatha poosavaa
minji onnu podavaa
saangumani poongazhuthil
thaali katta venumaiyaa

Vedala pulla nesathukku
sevatha pulla paasathukku
azhagar mala kaaththu
vandhu thoodhu sollaadho

maamambukku marudhu unna
marandhirukka mudiyalaiye
marugi marugi urugi
karaindhu vaada vaikkuriye (2)

meesaiyulla amabalaikku
rosham onnu podhumaa
michangala meethangala
naanum solla venumaa

pachcha kili nenjukulle
moga theeya moottura
paasangala moodi vachchi
paavam laabam kaattura

vaetti kattum maappille
buththi mattum podhala
kovapattaa laabam illa
serthukittaa paavam illa.

Vedala pulla nesathukku
sevatha pulla paasathukku
azhagar mala kaaththu
vandhu thoodhu sollaadho.(2)

vaasamalli poothirukku
vaakkapada kaathirukku
saangumani poongazhuthil
thaali katta venumaiyaa
saangumani poongazhuthil
thaali katta venumaiyaa

Vedala pulla nesathukku
sevatha pulla paasathukku
azhagar mala kaaththu
vandhu thoodhu sollaadho.
